text: Hey guys is it possible to create your own cta like in the actual design tools the ones I keep building in the CTA builder are very blurry

Thats odd that they are coming out blurry. Ive never really experienced that. But there is no reason you cant style your own anchor tags into a button form? But you lose the native HS tracking. And you would need to add a class name to an anchor in an RTE in order to add it to pages.

But you shouldnt really have issues with a normal CTA. Is it an image CTA by chance? maybe the resolution on the image is incorrect?

Hey, <@UGMGP7A72>, what kind of sytle options are you looking to add? Are you asking how to add fields to a module? If so that is done by adding objects to the moduleâ€™s fields.JSON file. Then you can reference them by name in the HTML file like normal.
